name: Karst
description:
You are trapped in a dangerous and often tight cave. Are you skilled enough to blast your way out? This game was made for BenBonk Game Jam #2 Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, the mouse to shoot, and your wits to survive in this top-down shooter with 9 increasingly difficult levels. Credits: Sprite Artist:

MisterDll

Programmer:

jonesnil

Special Thanks:

North_ray1

External Assets (free for non-commercial use): Music:

I use Ketsa's music for a lot of projects and this was no exception, his music is awesome and has a lot of range. The intro song is Our Little Blessings, and the BGM is Haunted Past. Check out those and other songs of his here:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/

Sound FX:

Portal sound is from CeebFrack:

https://freesound.org/people/CeebFrack/sounds/132593/

The enemy-hurt sound is from cusconauta:

https://freesound.org/people/cusconauta/sounds/219014/

Player knock-back sound is from juskiddink:

https://freesound.org/people/juskiddink/sounds/108617/

Font:

The cool hand-written font is from Chequered Ink:

https://www.dafont.com/bardolatry.font
